report.title: Dead Wild Boar records for iMammalia
report.description: Notification sent on a record of a dead boar.
report.query: SELECT o.id as occurrence_id, o.date_start as date, 'Wild Boar' AS species, st_y(st_centroid(st_transform(public_geom, 4326))) AS lat, st_x(st_centroid(st_transform(public_geom, 4326))) AS lon, 'Notification that a Wild Boar carcass has been recorded.' as comment, t.term as observation_type, string_agg(dbn.user_id::text, ', ') as notify_user_ids, 'Notification that a Wild Boar carcass has been recorded.' as log_comment, o.website_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional o -- Check dead. JOIN occurrence_attribute_values v on v.occurrence_id=o.id AND v.deleted=false AND v.occurrence_attribute_id=800 AND v.int_value in (17464, 17465) -- Not already notified. JOIN cache_termlists_terms t ON t.id=v.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_comments ocdone ON ocdone.occurrence_id=o.id AND ocdone.deleted=false AND ocdone.comment like '%Notification that a Wild Boar carcass has been recorded.' AND ocdone.created_on>o.created_on -- Find users for this record JOIN imammalia.dead_boar_notifications dbn ON dbn.location_ids IS NULL OR dbn.location_ids && o.location_ids WHERE o.website_id=122 -- Check Wild Boar. AND o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key='MWEB0036' -- Need to scan records in past to allow time for spatial indexing. AND o.created_on > '#date#'::date-'2 days'::interval -- Not already notified. AND ocdone.id is null GROUP BY o.id, o.date_start, st_y(st_centroid(st_transform(public_geom, 4326))), st_x(st_centroid(st_transform(public_geom, 4326))), t.term, o.website_id
